description: Complete lesson template matching the new visual interface with 5 phases: Welcome → Beginning (Q1) → Middle (Q2) → End (Q3) → Wisdom

sample_lesson.title: Music Evolution - The Soundtrack of Civilization
sample_lesson.learning_objective: Explore musical development while understanding how cultural evolution reflects and shapes social values, technology, and global connections.

elements.lesson_preview: Today's lesson is all about Music Evolution!
elements.welcome_message: Welcome to your daily learning journey. Let's explore how music has evolved alongside human civilization.

elements.question_text: What drives the evolution of music across different cultures?

teaching_moments.option_a_feedback: Technology plays a role, but let's explore the deeper human elements that truly drive musical evolution.
teaching_moments.option_b_feedback: Excellent insight! Music evolves as a reflection of our social bonds and changing values across time and cultures.

visual_elements.choice_buttons: positioned left and right of silhouette

elements.question_text: How does music serve as a bridge between different generations and cultures?

choices.option_a: Through shared rhythms and universal melodies
choices.option_b: By carrying stories and emotions across time

teaching_moments.option_a_feedback: Rhythms and melodies do connect us, but there's an even deeper layer of connection through music.
teaching_moments.option_b_feedback: Beautifully understood! Music carries the emotional DNA of human experience, connecting hearts across centuries.

elements.question_text: What can today's music evolution teach us about adapting to rapid technological change?

choices.option_a: Embrace new tools while preserving human connection
choices.option_b: Focus on creating the most technically advanced music

teaching_moments.option_a_feedback: Perfect! Music shows us how to evolve with technology while maintaining our essential human connections.
teaching_moments.option_b_feedback: Technical advancement matters, but music's greatest power lies in maintaining human connection through change.

section_1.title: Reflection
section_1.content: Music evolves as we evolve, carrying forward the essence of human experience.

section_2.title: Insight
section_2.content: Every generation adds its voice to the eternal human song.

section_3.title: Growth
section_3.content: Understanding musical evolution helps us navigate all forms of cultural change.

elements.daily_fortune: Your appreciation for cultural evolution will guide you through times of rapid change.
